price: 3. Waarlijk Wij hebben hem de weg getoond, of hij dankbaar of ondankbaar zal zijn.
arabic: إِنَّا هَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرٗا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: innā hadaynāhu al-sabīla immā shākiran wa-immā kafūran
